description: This file defines React components for a UI sheet (drawer/modal) using Radix UI primitives and custom styling. It includes overlay, content, header, footer, title, description, trigger, close button components, and configures animations and side variations.

classes.name: SheetContent
classes.description: Main content component for the sheet, handles rendering overlay, content area, and close button, with slide-in/out animations based on side.

classes.name: SheetHeader
classes.description: Component for the header section of the sheet, with customizable styling.

classes.name: SheetFooter
classes.description: Component for the footer section with layout styling for action buttons or additional info.

classes.name: SheetTitle
classes.description: Component for the sheet’s title text, styled for prominence.

classes.name: SheetDescription
classes.description: Component for auxiliary descriptive text within the sheet.

methods.name: cn
methods.description: Utility function to concatenate class names conditionally.
